attributes.contentHtml:
RumGuru Hmm let's see the tags:

  1. Scammer - I already said that it was a joke multiple times, and you don't have any proof that I scammed. The fact that I just said „gimme a min” „im scamming a kid” „from 100 usd” and I didn't provide any image proof in DMs that I actually was doing that. It was so funny seeing you attach the image containing that lmfao.
  2. Bad Services - MJCloud isn't a bad service. We have over 99% uptime, backups on an off-site storage server. Soon we might even provide 1 core of i9-9900K for free!
  3. Illegal Activities & Illegal Operations - I think this is about the no ToS & PP thing, well you can still access the old ToS and PP. The new one will be released tomorrow or today, as I said before.

honk You said it and then later after couple of hours you say "im joking"
Thats stupid why didnt you say "im joking" right after
How do i know that you are not lying?
i never mentioned uptime or quality, i just said you are treating customers bad

  1. First that domain is not mjcloud domain, and you were working without tos for month
